Virtual Charity Walk/Run - Organize a virtual charity walk or run where participants can register and create their own fundraising page. Participants can then collect donations from friends, family, and colleagues by sharing their fundraising page on social media platforms. This event can be held on a specific date and time, and participants can track their progress and donations on a leaderboard. Confidence Score: 0.8/1

Charity Fashion Show - Host a charity fashion show where local designers and boutiques donate clothing and accessories for an auction. Invite guests to attend the event and bid on the donated items. Additionally, offer sponsorship opportunities for local businesses to sponsor a "model of the night" or a "fashion show segment." Confidence Score: 0.9/1

Charity Gaming Marathon - Organize a charity gaming marathon where participants can donate to a designated charity for each hour they play. Partner with local gaming stores or cafes to host the event, and encourage participants to raise funds through pledges or donations. Confidence Score: 0.8/1

Charity Marketplace - Host a charity marketplace where local artisans and vendors can sell their handmade or donated items. Set up a designated area for vendors to sell their items, and donate a percentage of the proceeds to a designated charity. Confidence Score: 0.8/1

Charity Trivia Night - Host a charity trivia night where participants can form teams and compete in a trivia competition. Charge an entry fee for each team, and donate a percentage of the proceeds to a designated charity. Offer prizes for the winning teams, and encourage participants to raise additional funds through pledges or donations. Confidence Score: 0.9/1
